title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart - the perfect companion for all your gardening needs!

This garden cart is specially designed to make your gardening tasks easier and more enjoyable. The steel mesh frame ensures durability and long-lasting use, while the quick assembly feature allows you to start using it in no time. The removable side panels provide added versatility, allowing you to easily load and unload your gardening materials.

With its convertible design, this cart can transform into a flatbed cart, giving you even more flexibility and convenience. The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure smooth and easy maneuverability, while the tight turn radius allows you to navigate tight spaces with ease. The ample ground clearance ensures that you can easily move over various terrains without any hassle.

The 4-wheel design provides stability and balance, making it easy to transport heavy loads. With a capacity of 400 lb, this cart can handle all your gardening tools, plants, and supplies. The spacious bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width provide ample space for all your gardening needs.

The straight pull handle makes it comfortable and easy to maneuver the cart, while the 1-year limited warranty gives you peace of mind. Standing at 37 inches in overall height and weighing just 36.6 pounds, this cart is lightweight and easily portable.

The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is available in a vibrant green color, adding a touch of style to your gardening activities. Don't miss out on this essential gardening tool that will make your gardening experience easier and more enjoyable.

Remember, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is the perfect choice for all elderly folks who want a durable, versatile, and easy-to-use garden cart. Get yours today and start enjoying the benefits of this incredible gardening tool!

Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart! This durable and versatile cart is perfect for all your gardening needs. 

The frame is made of strong steel mesh, ensuring its durability and longevity. With quick and easy assembly, you'll have this cart ready to go in no time. The side panels are also removable, allowing you to easily load and unload your items. 

But that's not all! This cart is also convertible, transforming into a flatbed cart for larger items. The 10-inch pneumatic tires provide smooth and easy maneuverability, with a tight turn radius and ample ground clearance. The 4-wheel design ensures stability and balance, even with a maximum capacity of 400 lbs. 

The bed dimensions measure 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width, providing plenty of space for your gardening tools and supplies. The straight pull handle allows for comfortable and easy pulling, reducing strain on your back. 

Rest easy with the 1-year limited warranty, ensuring your satisfaction and peace of mind. The overall height of the cart is 37 inches, and it weighs just 36.6 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to handle. 

And to top it all off, this cart comes in a vibrant green color, adding a touch of style to your gardening routine. 

Don't miss out on the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Get yours today and make your gardening tasks a breeze!
